Text:
If the download doesn't start use the Initial Seeding option.
(Right click on the torrent->Properties->Check Initial Seeding option)

Please Comment if you like the edition.
I recommend playing at 1024x768 resolution.

Unfortunately, the files inside the archive are ' hidden ', so , make sure you activate the ' Show hidden files and folders ' option in :
Tools Menu->Folder Options->View(tab)->scroll down and check: ' Show hidden files and folders   ' and click Apply and OK.
The archive contents should appear where they were extracted.
AGAIN, THE GAME WORKS, IT'S JUST THAT YOU HAVE TO ACTIVATE THE ' SHOW HIDDEN FILES AND FOLDERS OPTION '.
